import { Meta, Subtitle } from '@storybook/blocks';

<Meta title="Docs/Templates/MDX Documentation" />

# MDX Documentation Template

```jsx
    // MDX Documentation Template
    import { Canvas, Story, Subtitle, Controls, Meta } from '@storybook/blocks';

    # My Component

    <Subtitle>
      Some description of the component functionality.
    </Subtitle>

    ## Base Style

    Some description of how to use the base component, potential gotchas and limitations.

    <Canvas>
      <Story of={ComponentStories.Default} />
    </Canvas>

    ## Variants

    <Canvas>
      <Story of={ComponentStories.Variants} />
    </Canvas>

    ## Slots, Props & Events

    <Controls />

    ## Usage

    ### Import

    ```jsx
    import { DtMyComponent } from '@dialpad/dialtone-vue';
    ```

    ### With Some Variant

    ```vue
    <dt-my-component
      some="variant"
    />
    ```

    ### With Some Other Variant

    ```vue
    <dt-my-component
      some-other="variant"
    />
    ```
```
